schedule.title: Simhachalam Temple
schedule.description: Start from Jagadamba (~20 km, ~45 min drive). Reach by 7:45 AM. ₹100 special darshan. Less crowd early morning.

schedule.title: Breakfast near Simhachalam
schedule.description: South Indian tiffin: idli, dosa, sambhar, filter coffee.

schedule.title: Sri Kanaka Mahalakshmi Temple
schedule.description: Backtrack ~20 km (~45 min). Sevas like Ksheerabhishekam (Fri only), Panchamruthabhishekam, Samuhika Ashtothara.

schedule.title: Snacks at Jagadamba
schedule.description: Try vada, upma, or mini biryani in Jagadamba Centre.

schedule.title: Kailasagiri Park & Ropeway
schedule.description: Hilltop ropeway ride, views, Shiva-Parvati statue. Toy train optional.

schedule.title: Lunch @ Kailasagiri
schedule.description: Eat at hilltop cafe with sea view.

schedule.title: INS Submarine Museum + RK Beach
schedule.description: Visit India’s only submarine museum and walk on RK Beach.

schedule.title: Evening Temple Visit
schedule.description: Choose Sampath Vinayagar or Venkateswara Temple (near Waltair/Asilmetta).

schedule.title: Dinner at Jagadamba / Suryabagh
schedule.description: Andhra meals or seafood at popular restaurants.

plans.note: Ideal for a car-based day trip from Jagadamba Centre covering iconic temples, beach, and city views.

schedule.title: Simhachalam Temple

schedule.title: Breakfast at Simhachalam
schedule.description: Idli, dosa, sambhar, coffee near temple area.

schedule.title: Sri Kanaka Mahalakshmi Temple
schedule.description: Backtrack ~20 km (~45 min). Minimal queues. Optional sevas ₹20–₹200.

schedule.title: Snack Break in Jagadamba
schedule.description: Light snack near city center.

schedule.title: Kailasagiri Ropeway & Park
schedule.description: Ropeway ride, hilltop park, Shiva-Parvati statue, lunch.

schedule.title: INS Submarine Museum + RK Beach
schedule.description: From Kailasagiri, ~12 km (~25 min). Explore museum & stroll on beach.

schedule.title: Evening Temple
schedule.description: Nearby temples in Waltair (~2–3 km). Sampath Vinayagar or Venkateswara.

schedule.title: Dinner
schedule.description: Andhra thali / seafood at Jagadamba or Suryabagh.

schedule.title: Visakha Museum
schedule.description: Located on RK Beach Road (~4 km from Jagadamba). Maritime and heritage exhibits.

schedule.title: Tenneti Park
schedule.description: Coastal green park with sea view (~3.5 km).

schedule.title: Lunch @ RK Beach
schedule.description: Restaurants nearby. Andhra meals / seafood.

schedule.title: Matsyadarshini Aquarium
schedule.description: Air-conditioned marine display. ~4 km from Jagadamba.

schedule.title: Dinner at Jagadamba
schedule.description: Try Andhra-style thali / snacks.

schedule.title: Kambalakonda Wildlife Sanctuary
schedule.description: Drive ~16 km. Birdwatching and nature walk.

schedule.title: Lunch Stop
schedule.description: Snacks or meals near sanctuary or return route.

schedule.title: Biodiversity Park
schedule.description: Botanical garden with butterflies & bird zone.

schedule.title: Return to City
schedule.description: Drive back to Jagadamba. Evening rest.

schedule.title: Dinner @ Beach Road
schedule.description: Seafood or regional Andhra cuisine.

plans.note: Designed for car rental users to explore Vizag with comfort and flexibility across temples, beaches, and nature spots.
